main event: A civilian observed an unidentified flying object exhibiting unusual characteristics near Opelousas, Louisiana.
interesting points: The sighting was reported between 0143 and 0201 hours on 24/7/52., The object was described as pancake-shaped and silver., The observer initially thought it might be weather balloons due to its shape., The object was still visible when the observer went inside a building to use the telephone., The source of the report is considered reliable.
